navbar.about: this page has information about the website
navbar.options: this page lets you customize the website

themes.smilie_lavender: light theme, yellow-color sidebar, lavender-color cards
themes.smilie_coffee: light theme, yellow-color sidebar, coffee-color cards
themes.owl: (blue) dark theme, dark-color sidebar, dark-color background
themes.plum_owl: (plum-color) dark theme, dark-color sidebar, dark-color background
themes.purple_owl: (purple) dark theme, dark-color sidebar, dark-color background
themes.lavender: dark theme, lavender-color sidebar, yellow text
themes.salmon: dark theme, salmon-color sidebar, yellow text
themes.hot_pink: light theme, magenta sidebar, light pink background

themeProps.navbarBG1: navbar/sidebar top (usually lighter) background (the background is a gradient)
themeProps.navbarBG2: navbar/sidebar bottom (usually darker) background (the background is a gradient)
themeProps.navbarText: mobile navbar arrow color, also language picker text color
themeProps.navbarAccent: color for special items in the navbar such as options or login
themeProps.accent: NAME IS MISLEADING, color used for NAVBAR ITEMS (name is preserved due to backwards compatibility)
themeProps.cardBG: background color for cards (q+a boxes, color picker box, you can name them boxes)
themeProps.cardText: text color for cards (q+a boxes, color picker box, you can name them boxes)
themeProps.cardAccent: accent color for cards (q+a boxes, color picker box, you can name them boxes)
